sentences.sContent: Actually predial servitude provides a common right mode of setting up usufruct on real estate for the convenience of new utilization becoming property right.
sentences.sContent_eng: Actually predial servitude provides a common right mode of setting up usufruct on real estate for the convenience of new utilization becoming property right.
sentences.sCn: 地役权实际上提供了一个在不动产上设立用益物权的一般权利模型，为新的物的利用方式生成为物权提供了方便。

trans.tranCn: 土地的,不动产的,乡村的
trans.tranOther: of or relating to land, farming, etc
